DataElement.preferredName: CRQ-SAS 20 Last 2 Weeks How Often Feel Restless Tense or Uptight Score 7 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Persons' stated observation in the last 2 weeks of how often they felt restless, tense, or uptight, using an 7 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format Past 2 Weeks How Often Feel Restless, Tense, or Uptight Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A standardized rating scale developed by Schunemann et al in 2003, which is a self-administered instrument used to measure the health-related quality of life (HRQL) in patients with chronic airflow limitation._A period of time consisting of the 14 days before the present._A question about the frequency of an event or behavior._A question about an individual feeling restless, tense, or uptight._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A standardized rating scale developed by Schunemann et al in 2003, which is a self-administered instrument used to measure the health-related quality of life (HRQL) in patients with chronic airflow limitation.

Concepts.longName: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format
Concepts.definition: A standardized rating scale developed by Schunemann et al in 2003, which is a self-administered instrument used to measure the health-related quality of life (HRQL) in patients with chronic airflow limitation.

Property.preferredName: Past 2 Weeks How Often Feel Restless, Tense, or Uptight Score
Property.preferredDefinition: A period of time consisting of the 14 days before the present.:A question about the frequency of an event or behavior.:A question about an individual feeling restless, tense, or uptight.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A period of time consisting of the 14 days before the present.
A question about the frequency of an event or behavior.
A question about an individual feeling restless, tense, or uptight.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something occurs rarely or with very little intensity.

ReferenceDocuments.name: In general, how often during
ReferenceDocuments.description: In general, how often during the LAST 2 WEEKS have you felt restless, tense, or uptight?
